attributes.action: block the premier league playing a 39th league game abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yesterday (07/02/08)the premier league revealed they had held talks with all premier league clubs about playing a 39th round of fixtures abroad from the start of the 2010/11 season.

If you believe this threatens the tradition and integrity of english football and the english football league system please sign this petition.

The premier league havent yet agreed to go ahead with these plans but I believe the public need to make it known how they feel so that these plans are never finalised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
